overview: The collage of fashion creations from the fashion magazine in Cankarjev dom begins as browsing through the trendy Fashion magazine. Models wear leather clothing, accompanied by Italian, Yugoslavian and American pop music from the 1960s. In addition to walking the catwalk, scenes from behind the scenes were also filmed. The camera is positioned high to the left of the catwalk. Scenes are often cut out, multiplied, and strung as photographs.
title: Nostalgični izrez
